author: GW gizmo
comment: Useless don't download   I have tried 4 songs with this app. 3 came up and 1 did not but the 3 that came up only one of the songs was correct. So please take my advice and do not waste your memory on this garbage of an app :(

author: Sergiu Avram
comment: This app works really good when it is to identify music. But when I'm not using it, in the background it's using very mucha data. Mucha more that in foreground. And also drains the battery, because it seems that it's not good in deep sleep. I would really like to know what else is doing with my phone!

author: AJ_ Foever AKA HACKER
comment: It was working fine before i caught over 30 songs! But then an update appeared and i updated it and i cant even listen to the song i want anymore. when i hit record and listen it somehow went back where i first started which is the profile screen. Plz fix and u will get 5 stars
title: Recent update deserves an uninstall

author: Racer Girl
comment: I heard an instrumental song during pregame of a football show, it had talking in it.I wanted the song but had no idea who composed it or the name of it. I recorded it on the DVR, then played it on the DVR and used sound recorder on my tablet to record it through a surround sound speaker. You can imagine the crappy quality, but I ran the file I recorded and played it through my tablet speaker while also running music ID, it took a few attempts but TADAAA, it worked. It showed the song and album and artist..Wow! What an awesome app. I will continue to use it.
title: Wow!

author: Katrina Henderson
comment: Some music it cant identify at all amd sometimes it doesnt search or listen. I have to type the mic button 5 times for it to start listening and then it doesnt identify th songs. this needs to be fixed. This app is broken after the update of app.

author: Karen Rickards Hardie
comment: I tried uninstalling and reinstalling it, but I still can't get past the first three screens. The Let's Do This button is barely visible and doesn't respond. Please fix this!
title: Used to be great, but doesn't work anymore

author: Wilson Fu
comment: Stopped working. It worked like a charm until the update. Now, you press the listen button and then it returns to previous screen without attempting to identify song. Irritating

author: Kaitlynn Chiarvalloti
comment: I used to be able to get like 5 seconds of a song and it could tell what it was. Now I get it at the beginning of the song and it just keeps saying can't find a match try again. To literally every song. I used to swear by this app. Not anymore.
title: Can't tell what song is playing.

author: Olypen Guy
comment: Worked great, but now says there's no microphone on my device. Everything else works great on my phone, so I am led to believe that it must be a problem with the app. My phone is the droid turbo 2

author: Tonya James
comment: I love this app!  I love that it saves the songs that you've looked up.  I have never had any problem at all the it recognizing the songs that i look up which is contemporary Christian.  So is a full five star for me.
title: SPOT ON

comment: I'm disappointed this is because I've tried about 10 different apps and this was the last one I tried and none of them can recognise this one song and this app was so highly recommended amongst all my friends

author: Furkat Vakhabov
comment: Thank you! I searched one song about 20 days and this app found it! Also I had searched my lovely Track ID app which I had on my SonyErricson k770i phone 8 years ago and I founded it under another name! Because this app also powered by Gracenote! Before I used Shazam but it cannot do his work properly as this app! Your job with microphone is incredible!

author: QuEeN PrOpH
comment: Works perfectly fine on my android!  Love it! Works great when you're watching something on tv and a song comes on that you like and want to know what it is
title: Great App

author: Paul Conrad
comment: I love using this app to journal the songs I hear. You can add notes and locations to songs, which is really nice. Great job Gravity Mobile!

This app is awesome for exactly what you want it to do. If you're in the car, tap the sound icon and hold it up to the speaker. It will easily identify what song is playing. Definitely a 5-Star app!!👍👍
